# convert(to:)

**Instance Method**

Converts the contents of the 8-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved pixel buffer to 32-bit-per-channel format.

## Declaration

```swift
func convert(to destination: vImage.PixelBuffer<vImage.InterleavedFx4>)
```

## Parameters

- **destination**: The destination pixel buffer.

## Discussion

This function converts the source values in the range `[0, 255]` to the destination range `[0.0, 1.0]`.

## Conversion from 8-bit to 32-bit

- **convert(to:)**: Converts the contents of the 8-bit planar pixel buffer to 32-bit planar format.
- **convert(to:)**: Converts the contents of the 8-bit-per-channel, 3-channel interleaved pixel buffer to 32-bit-per-channel format.
